channel.title: Changing the client picture?
channel.description: i need help changing the client picture. i went to my client and went into sprites and then i got the picture and i found the dimensions so i made my picture that big. and then i looked through the folder and there was a picture called shortcut to original. so i took that out and made a short cut to my picture. and then itll just take forever to load and then itll say unable to play. can someone help?

item.title: Changing the client picture?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

i need help changing the client picture.
i went to my client and went into sprites and then i got the picture and i found the dimensions so i made my picture that big.
and then i looked through the folder and there was a picture called shortcut to original.
so i took that out and made a short cut to my picture.
and then itll just take forever to load and then itll say unable to play.
can someone help?
